TextLibrary.Text: Port of Elysia, we are seeking the whereabouts of a Trident Military ship that may have passed through this way a day or so ago.
Port of Elysia, we are seeking the whereabouts of a Trident Military ship that may have passed through this way a day or so ago.
Greetings, MRI ship. We would be happy to be of service to you, if YOU would first be of service to us.
Greetings, MRI Ship. We would be happy to be of service to you, if YOU would first be of service to us.
Okay... What do you need, Port of Elysia?
Okay... What do you need, Port of Elysia?
We have no military presence here at this moment, MRI ship. If you dispatch 2 Pirate ships that have been attacking us, we will happily provide you with directions to the ship you are seeking.
We have no military presence here at this moment, MRI ship. If you dispatch 2 Pirate ships that have been attacking us, we will happily provide you with directions to the ship you are seeking.
